Package game.Items.token

Class TokenManager

java.lang.Object
game.Items.token.TokenManager
public class TokenManager extends Object
A global Singleton manager that does soft-reset on the Token of Souls.
Version:
1
Author:
Shin Yung Xin
See Also:
TokenOfSouls, ResetAction
